summary: This mod adds several kinds of Arrows, Bows  and a shop, where you can buy them.
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds Arrows : 
Absorb Arrow (Absorbing Life)
Catapult Arrow (You\'re shooting a big fireball like that of the catapult)
\"Spit\" Arrow (This is an arrow with the chaurus poison)
Push Arrow (Pushes everything away)
Dragonfire Arrow (Fire like the fire shout)
Ballista Bolt (it shoots the Ballsista Bolts and explodes)
Dart ( Like a trapdart)
also 2 Bows:
GhostBow ( almost Invisible)
\"Machinegun\" (Loads in less than 1/4 sec. )
And a shop in Whiterun (Just go to the market in whiterun, right to the tavern there is a way, follow it and you\'ll find the shop)
whit a ranger
author: JoshuaSu
